description: Support specifying initial default values for controls. In markdown, allow default values in parentheses after the range. If not specified, default to zero if in range, otherwise use the minimum value. In JSON, use 'defaultValue' in 'value' or 'values' elements. Update code and documentation accordingly.

description:
Support the 'mode' property in the JSON schema for controls, with allowed values: default, unipolar, bipolar, momentary, toggle. For faders, unipolar is default; for buttons, toggle is default. In the markdown spec, infer that a fader is bipolar if the range starts at a negative number. Infer a control is a button with momentary behavior if the choices are "Held" and "Released".

Update code and documentation as needed.

title: Add optional Color/Colour column support for control colors
description: Allow optional 'Color' or 'Colour' column in input markdown tables with 6-character hex RGB values. Color applies to current row's control and all subsequent controls until next non-empty color value. Output JSON should include color at same level as control id in format: "color": "F45C51"
